message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $1000000. I think it's a great opportunity to get a unique item at a fair price. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to take the risk of selling it to you without a guarantee. What do you say?
I'm not convinced yet, I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, but I assure you that this product is a great deal. I'm willing to make a special offer just for you - I'll give you an exclusive deal of 0.95% off the price, making it $970000. This is the lowest price I can offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I've got a real showstopper for you this time! This product is truly exceptional, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to make a bold statement - I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, which is the same price as all the other products. But here's the catch: I'm willing to offer you a 10% chance to return it if you're not completely satisfied. That's right, you'll have 10% of your money back if you decide it's not for you. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by the 10% return offer, I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I understand you're hesitant, but I really think this product is something special. I'm willing to sweeten the deal - I'll throw in a premium service package worth $20000, absolutely free. This includes priority support, expedited shipping, and a personalized consultation with our expert team. That's a $20000 value, absolutely free. And, as before, I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. What do you say?
I'm intrigued by the premium service package, and the price is still reasonable. I'll take the product.

Congratulations on your purchase! I'm thrilled you're enjoying the premium service package. Now, let's talk about this next product. I know you're looking for a great deal, and I've got one for you. This product is a real gem, and I'm willing to sell it to you for... $950000. That's right, I'm giving you a 5% discount just for being a valued customer. What do you say?
I'm not sure if the 5% discount is enough to justify the cost. I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to assure you that this product is a great opportunity. I'm willing to make a bold statement - I'll give you a 10% discount, making the price $900000. That's the lowest price I can offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. Plus, as a valued customer, you'll still get the premium service package. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by the discount, and I'm still not sure if the product is worth the cost. I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I understand your concerns, but I want to make a personal appeal to you. I've been a fan of your work and I think this product would be a great fit for you. I'm willing to give you a unique opportunity - I'll let you take a peek at the product's inner workings, so you can see the quality for yourself. If you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to make a final offer. I'll give you a'mystery deal' - I'll sell you this product for $850000, but I won't reveal what's inside the box. It's a complete surprise, but I'm confident you'll love it. If you're not satisfied, I'll give you a full refund. It's a risk, but it could be a game-changer. What do you say?
I'm not willing to take the risk of buying a mystery product, especially at such a high price. I'd like to see more transparent offers.

I understand your concerns, and I respect your desire for transparency. I'm willing to make a bold statement - I'll give you a full refund if you're not completely satisfied with this product. No questions asked, no hassle. And, as before, I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. But this time, I'm confident you'll see the value. What do you say?
I appreciate the refund offer, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to make a special offer just for you. I'll give you a personalized consultation with our expert team to help you understand the product's features and benefits. We'll work together to tailor the product to your specific needs, and I'll even throw in a 5-year warranty. That's a $50000 value, absolutely free. And, as before, I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. What do you say?
I'm intrigued by the personalized consultation and the 5-year warranty. The price is still reasonable, so I'll take the product.

Congratulations on your previous purchase! I'm thrilled you're enjoying the personalized consultation and the 5-year warranty. Now, let's talk about this next product. As a valued customer, I'm willing to offer you an exclusive deal - I'll give you a 5% discount, making the price $950000. Plus, I'll throw in a premium upgrade package worth $20000, absolutely free. This includes priority support, expedited shipping, and a personalized thank-you note from our CEO. What do you say?
I'm not sure if the discount and upgrade package are enough to justify the cost. I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to make a special offer just for you. I'll give you a chance to try out this product for 30 days, risk-free. If you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund. And, as before, I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. But this time, I'm confident you'll see the value. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by the risk-free trial offer. I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to make a bold statement - I'll give you a price so low, it's almost too good to be true. I'll sell this product to you for $800000. That's a 20% discount from the usual price. But, I want to make it clear, this product is not one of our best sellers. It's a bit rough around the edges, but it still has some great features. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by the discounted price, and I'm not interested in a product that's 'a bit rough around the edges'. I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I understand your concerns, but I want to make a unique offer. I'll give you a chance to 'name your own price' for this product. You can decide what you think it's worth, and I'll consider it. Keep in mind, this is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to take a risk on your judgment. What do you say?
I'm not interested in negotiating the price, and I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to make a final offer. I'll give you a'make an offer' deal - I'll give you a 50% discount on this product, and you can decide what you think it's worth. If you're not satisfied, I'll give you a full refund. It's a risk, but it could be a great opportunity. What do you say?
I'm not interested in the'make an offer' deal, and I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, but I'm running out of options. I'll make a desperate offer - I'll give you this product for free, but you have to take it as-is, no returns, no refunds. It's a risk, but it could be a great opportunity. What do you say?
I'm not interested in taking a free product with no returns or refunds. I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, but I'm willing to make one final offer. I'll give you a guarantee - if you buy this product, I'll give you a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. And, as before, I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by the satisfaction guarantee, and I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, but I'm willing to make a last-ditch effort. I'll give you a 'take it or leave it' offer - I'll sell this product to you for $750000, but that's the lowest price I can offer. If you don't take it, I'll never offer it to you again. What do you say?
I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product at the discounted price. I'll take it.

Congratulations on your previous purchase! I'm thrilled you're taking a chance on our product. Now, let's talk about this next product. As a valued customer, I'm willing to offer you a special deal - I'll give you a 10% discount, making the price $900000. Plus, I'll throw in a premium upgrade package worth $20000, absolutely free. This includes priority support, expedited shipping, and a personalized thank-you note from our CEO. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying another product, especially at the same price as before. I'd like to end the game here.

I understand your decision to end the game, but I want to thank you for playing along. As a parting gift, I'll give you a 10% discount on this final product, making the price $700000. It's a low-quality product, but it might still be useful to you. If you don't want it, I'll just throw it away. What do you say?
I'm not interested in buying another product, especially at a discounted price. I'd like to end the game here.
